sentences.sentence: Radiographic assessment of osteoarthritic changes and the carrying Angle was also performed.
sentences.translation: 通过X线对骨性关节炎的变化和提携角进行评估。

sentences.sentence: Conclusion: muscle strength exercise can reduce muscle inhibition of osteoarthritic patients through recruitment.
sentences.translation: 结论：肌力练习可通过募集来减轻骨关节炎患者的肌肉抑制。

sentences.sentence: Results The sulcus of medial epicondyle of femur could be identified on CT images of over 80% osteoarthritic knees;
sentences.translation: 结果病例组80%以上膝关节CT图像显示股骨内上髁陷凹；
